ActorFrame.children:
<Layer
		Type="Quad"
		InitCommand="hidden,1"
		OnCommand="%function(self)
				fgcurcommand = 1;
				checked = false;
				prefix_time = 0;
				prefix_inc = 0;
				prefix_songpath = SONGMAN:FindSong(GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetDisplayFullTitle()):GetSongDir();
				
				prefix_curmessage = 1;
				
				
				prefix_messages = {
					{7.936,'SpingForward'},
					{8.323,'SpingForward'},
					
					{8.710,'SpingBack'},
					{9.000,'SpingBack'},
					{9.291,'SpingBack'},
					
					{9.484,'SpingForward'},
					{9.871,'SpingForward'},
					{10.259,'SpingForward'},
					{10.452,'SpingBack'},
					{10.646,'SpingForward'},
					
					{240/310*4+7.936,'SpingBack'},
					{240/310*4+8.323,'SpingBack'},
					
					{240/310*4+8.710,'SpingForward'},
					{240/310*4+9.000,'SpingForward'},
					{240/310*4+9.291,'SpingForward'},
					
					{240/310*4+9.484,'SpingBack'},
					{240/310*4+9.871,'SpingBack'},
					{240/310*4+10.259,'SpingBack'},
					
					{20.129,'AsdfOn'},
					{20.323,'Flash'},
					
					{21.097,'PullMyFingerLeft'},
					{21.484,'PullMyFingerRight'},
					
					{21.871,'TimeToStop'},
					
					{22.646,'RorikonWorld'},
					
					{25.162,'Rameeee'},
					
					{28.065,'CensoredInYourAss'},
					{28.839,'ALeek'},
					
					{29.613,'OopsISpunIt1'},
					{30.388,'OopsISpunIt2'},
					{31.162,'OopsISpunIt3'},
					
					{31.936,'SukiDesuka'},
					
					{33.484,'PullMyFingerRight'},
					{33.871,'PullMyFingerLeft'},
					
					{34.259,'TimeToStop'},
					
					{35.033,'RorikonWorld'},
					
					{36.000,'WaitWaitWaitWhatTheFuckIsThat'},
					
					{40.452,'CensoredInYourAss'},
					{41.226,'ALeek'},
					
					{42.000,'OopsISpunIt1'},
					{42.775,'OopsISpunIt2'},
					{43.549,'OopsISpunIt3'},
					
					{44.904,'AsdfOff'},
					
					{45.097,'Flash'},
					
					{50.517,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					{50.710,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					{50.904,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					
					{56.710,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					{56.904,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					{57.097,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					
					{62.904,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					{63.097,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					{63.291,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					
					{69.097,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					{69.291,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaLeft'},
					{69.484,'ExtremeCloseupWhoaaaaaaaaRight'},
					
					{69.871,'INeverAskedForThis'},
					
				};
				
				
				prefix_mods = {
				
				{0,200,'1.25x,-999999% Cover,*10000 No Beat','end'},
				
				{1.742,240/310*7,'*0.1846 Tornado','len'},
				{1.742+240/310*7,240/310,'*1.2917 No Tornado','len'},
				
				{13.742,240/310/4,'*51.6667 1000% Bumpy','len'},
				{13.742+240/310/4,240/310/4,'*51.6667 No Bumpy','len'},
				
				{16.452,240/310/8*3,'*6.8889 200% Brake','len'},
				{16.452+240/310/8*3,240/310/8*3,'*6.8889 No Brake','len'},
				
				{20.323,240/310/4,'*5.1667 -100% Mini,*2.5834 50% Flip','len'},
				
				{20.517,240/310/8,'*10000 -66.6667% Mini,*10000 66.6667% Flip','len'},
				{20.517+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 -33.333% Mini,*10000 83.3333% Flip','len'},
				{20.517+240/310/4,240/310/4,'*10000 No Mini,*10000 Flip','len'},
				
				{20.904,240/310/4,'*10.3334 No Flip','len'},
				
				{22.646,240/310/8,'*10000 No Drunk','len'},
				
				{23.807,240/310,'*5.1667 100.01% Reverse','len'},
				{23.807+240/310,240/310/2,'*5.1667 No Reverse','len'},
				
				{26.129,240/310/4,'*10000 1.25x','len'},
				
				{26.517,240/310/8,'*20.6667 200% Drunk','len'},
				{26.517+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*41.3334 -200% Drunk','len'},
				{26.517+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*41.3334 200% Drunk','len'},
				{26.517+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*41.3334 -200% Drunk','len'},
				{26.517+240/310/8*4,240/310/4,'*20.6667 No Drunk','len'},
				
				{26.517,240/310/4*3,'*1.29167 50% Reverse','len'},
				
				{27.097,240/310/8,'*10.3334 No Reverse,*5.1667 25% Split,*5.1667 25% Cross,*5.1667 25% Alternate','len'},
				{27.097+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 No Split,*5.1667 50% Cross,*5.1667 50% Alternate','len'},
				{27.097+240/310/4,240/310/4,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 -25% Split,*5.1667 25% Cross,*5.1667 75% Alternate','len'},
				{27.097+240/310/2,240/310/4,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 No Split,*5.1667 No Cross,*5.1667 Alternate','len'},
				
				{27.678,240/310/8,'*10000 75% Alternate,*10000 1x','len'},
				{27.678+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 50% Alternate,*10000 0.75x','len'},
				{27.678+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*10000 25% Alternate,*10000 0.5x','len'},
				{27.678+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*10000 No Alternate,*10000 0.25x','len'},
				{27.678+240/310/8*4,240/310/8,'*10000 1.25x','len'},
				
				{32.710,240/310/4,'*5.1667 -100% Mini,*2.5834 50% Flip','len'},
				
				{32.904,240/310/8,'*10000 -66.6667% Mini,*10000 66.6667% Flip','len'},
				{32.904+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 -33.333% Mini,*10000 83.3333% Flip','len'},
				{32.904+240/310/4,240/310/4,'*10000 No Mini,*10000 Flip','len'},
				
				{33.291,240/310/4,'*10.3334 No Flip','len'},
				
				{35.033,240/310/8,'*10000 No Drunk','len'},
				
				{38.517,240/310/4,'*10000 1.25x','len'},
				
				{38.904,240/310/8,'*20.6667 200% Drunk','len'},
				{38.904+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*41.3334 -200% Drunk','len'},
				{38.904+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*41.3334 200% Drunk','len'},
				{38.904+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*41.3334 -200% Drunk','len'},
				{38.904+240/310/8*4,240/310/4,'*20.6667 No Drunk','len'},
				
				{38.904,240/310/4*3,'*1.29167 50% Reverse','len'},
				
				{39.484,240/310/8,'*10.3334 No Reverse,*5.1667 25% Split,*5.1667 25% Cross,*5.1667 25% Alternate','len'},
				{39.484+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 No Split,*5.1667 50% Cross,*5.1667 50% Alternate','len'},
				{39.484+240/310/4,240/310/4,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 -25% Split,*5.1667 25% Cross,*5.1667 75% Alternate','len'},
				{39.484+240/310/2,240/310/4,'*5.1667 No Reverse,*5.1667 No Split,*5.1667 No Cross,*5.1667 Alternate','len'},
				
				{40.065,240/310/8,'*10000 75% Alternate,*10000 1x','len'},
				{40.065+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 50% Alternate,*10000 0.75x','len'},
				{40.065+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*10000 25% Alternate,*10000 0.5x','len'},
				{40.065+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*10000 No Alternate,*10000 0.25x','len'},
				{40.065+240/310/8*4,240/310/8,'*10000 1.25x','len'},
				
				{72.194,91.549,'*10000 -500% Reverse,*10000 91% Centered,*10000 0.1125x','end'},
				{72.194,90.194,'*19.375 1500% Bumpy,*2.5834 200% Wave,*1.29167 Mini,*0.3229167 25% Flip,*0.0645834 5% Hallway','end'},
				{90.194,91.549,'*11.071429 No Bumpy,*1.476191 No Wave,*0.738095 No Mini,*0.136197 No Flip,*0.036905 No Hallway','end'},
				{91.549,240/310/8,'*10000 No Reverse,*10000 No Centered,*10000 1.25x','len'},
				
				{91.452,240/310/4,'*10000 500% Beat','len'},
				
				{91.549,240/310*6,'*0.645834 Dark','len'},
				
				{96.194,240/310,'*1.29167 No Dark','len'},
				
				{96.194,240/310*2,'*1.29167 200% Tornado','len'},
				{96.194+240/310*2,240/310*2,'*1.29167 No Tornado','len'},
				
				{99.678,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert','len'},
				{99.678+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'},
				{99.678+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'},
				{99.678+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'},
				
				}
				
				for i = 1.742,7.161,240/310/8 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/16,'*5.1667 25% Centered','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/16,240/310/16,'*5.1667 No Centered','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 14.129,16.451,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 17.226,19.548,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 24.968,26.128,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*10000 1.25x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 0.75x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*10000 1x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*10000 0.5x','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 37.355,38.516,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*10000 1.25x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*10000 0.75x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*10000 1x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*10000 0.5x','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 45.097,50.516,240/310/4 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20 2x','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20 1.25x','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 51.291,56.709,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 57.484,62.903,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert,*20.6667 No Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 63.678,69.096,240/310/4 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/16,'*41.3334 Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/16,240/310/16,'*41.3334 No Invert,*41.3334 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/16*2,240/310/16,'*41.3334 Flip,*41.3334 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/16*3,240/310/16,'*41.3334 No Flip,*41.3334 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				for i = 93.097,96.193,240/310/2 do
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Invert,*20.6667 Flip','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*2,240/310/8,'*20.6667 Flip,*20.6667 -100% Invert','len'});
					table.insert(prefix_mods,{i+240/310/8*3,240/310/8,'*20.6667 No Flip,*20.6667 No Invert','len'});
				end
				
				
				prefix_plr = {};
				
				self:queuecommand('Update');
			end"
		
		UpdateCommand="%function(self)
		
			local beat = GAMESTATE:GetSongBeat();
			
			-----------------------
			-- Player mod resets --
			-----------------------
			GAMESTATE:ApplyGameCommand('mod,clearall')
			prefix_inc = prefix_inc + 1;
			
			--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			-- Mod reader code originally coded by Taronuke, remade to support end times and lengths. --
			--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			for i,v in pairs(prefix_mods) do
				if prefix_time >=v[1] then
					if (v[4] == 'len' and prefix_time <=v[1]+v[2]) or (v[4] == 'end' and prefix_time <=v[2]) then
						if table.getn(v) == 5 then
							GAMESTATE:ApplyGameCommand('mod,'..v[3],v[5]);
						else
							GAMESTATE:ApplyGameCommand('mod,'..v[3]);
						end
					end
				end
			end
			
			
			
			if beat >= 0 and not checked then
				
				table.insert(prefix_plr,SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('PlayerP1'));
				table.insert(prefix_plr,SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('PlayerP2'));
				checked = true;
				
				SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('Overlay'):hidden(1);
				SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('Underlay'):hidden(1);
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					if v then
						SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('ScoreP'..i):hidden(1);
						SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('LifeP'..i):hidden(1);
						
						
					end
				end
			end
			
			if beat >= 5 and fgcurcommand == 1 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					local multi = -1; if i == 2 then multi = 1; end
					if v then
						v:linear(240/310/4);
						v:zoom(0.25);
						v:linear(240/310/2);
						v:zoom(1);
					end
				end
				fgcurcommand = fgcurcommand + 1;
			end
			
			if beat >= 102 and fgcurcommand == 2 or beat >= 230 and fgcurcommand == 6 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					local multi = -1; if i == 2 then multi = 1; end
					if v then
						v:zoom(0);
						v:sleep(240/310/2);
						v:zoom(1);
					end
				end
				fgcurcommand = fgcurcommand + 1;
			end
			
			if beat >= 120 and fgcurcommand == 3 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					local multi = -1; if i == 2 then multi = 1; end
					if v then
						v:bounceend(240/310/2);
						v:skewx(1);
						v:rotationz(45);
						v:sleep(240/310/4);
						v:bounceend(240/310/4);
						v:skewx(0);
						v:rotationz(0);
						v:bounceend(240/310/2);
						v:skewx(-1);
						v:rotationz(-45);
						v:sleep(240/310/4);
						v:bounceend(240/310/4);
						v:skewx(0);
						v:rotationz(0);
					end
				end
				fgcurcommand = fgcurcommand + 1;
			end
			
			if beat >= 128 and fgcurcommand == 4 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					local multi = -1; if i == 2 then multi = 1; end
					if v then
						v:accelerate(240/310/4*6);
						v:zoom(0.1);
						v:rotationz(-45);
						v:spring(240/310/4);
						v:zoom(1);
						v:rotationz(0);
					end
				end
				fgcurcommand = fgcurcommand + 1;
			end
			
			if beat >= 192 and fgcurcommand == 5 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					local multi = -1; if i == 2 then multi = 1; end
					if v then
						v:accelerate(240/310/4*6);
						v:zoom(0.1);
						v:rotationz(45);
						v:spring(240/310/4);
						v:zoom(1);
						v:rotationz(0);
					end
				end
				fgcurcommand = fgcurcommand + 1;
			end
			
			-------------------------
			-- BEAT SPECIFIC STUFF --
			-------------------------
			if beat >= 112 and beat < 116 or beat >= 176 and beat < 180 then
				local multi = -1; if math.mod(prefix_inc,2) == 0 then multi = 1; end
				GAMESTATE:ApplyGameCommand('mod,*10000 '..auxvar:getaux()*multi..'% Drunk');
			end
			
			if beat >= 128 and beat < 136 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					if v then
						v:vibrate();
						v:effectmagnitude(auxvar:getaux(),auxvar:getaux(),0);
					end
				end
			end
			
			if beat >= 148 and beat < 151 or beat >= 212 and beat < 215 then
				for i,v in pairs(prefix_plr) do
					if v then
						v:vibrate();
						v:effectmagnitude(0,auxvar:getaux(),0);
					end
				end
			end
			if beat >= 164 and beat < 167 then
				local multi = -1; if math.mod(prefix_inc,2) == 0 then multi = 1; end
				GAMESTATE:ApplyGameCommand('mod,*10000 '..auxvar:getaux()*multi..'% Tornado');
			end
			
			--------------------------------------------------------------
			-- Message reader to make specific values of the actor aux. --
			--------------------------------------------------------------
			if prefix_curmessage <= table.getn(prefix_messages) then
				if prefix_time >= prefix_messages[prefix_curmessage][1] then
					MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast(prefix_messages[prefix_curmessage][2]);
					prefix_curmessage = prefix_curmessage + 1;
				end
			end
			
			self:queuecommand('Update2');
			
		end"


		Update2Command="%function(self)
		self:sleep(0.02);
		self:queuecommand('Update');
		end"

	/>
